name: Terminal
description: A minimal blog theme for terminal lovers
author: Marc Anton Dahmen

tooltips.appleTouchIcon: The file to be used as Apple touch icon
tooltips.checkboxHideDateAndTags: Hide date and tags in post
tooltips.checkboxShowInFooter: Show a link to this page in the footer menu
tooltips.checkboxShowInNavbar: Show a link to this page in the navbar menu
tooltips.date: Set a date to show up as post info
tooltips.favicon: The file to be use as favicon
tooltips.formatDate: The format for displaying the date of a page
tooltips.itemsFooter: Additional markup to be added to page's footer
tooltips.itemsHeader: Additional markup to be added to page's <head></head> section
tooltips.itemsPerPage: The maximum number of items shown on a blog page
tooltips.labelMore: Optional label text for the "More" buttons
tooltips.labelShowAll: Label text for button to clear all filters
tooltips.placeholderSearch: Placeholder text for the search field of the main menu
tooltips.templateFilter: Filter blog items by template names (regex)
tooltips.text: The main content of the page
tooltips.textTeaser: The content of the teaser section
tooltips.urlTagLinkTarget: The target URL of the pagelist page for the tag buttons
